mapper.select: SELECT h.id, h.user_id, h.cover, h.title, h.content, h.people_number, h.reward, h.time_start, h.time_end, h.`status`, u.avatar, u.nickname From a_help h LEFT JOIN u_user u on u.id = h.user_id WHERE h.id = #{helpId}

SELECT h.id, h.cover, h.user_id, h.title, h.time_start, h.time_end, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM a_help h LEFT JOIN u_user u ON u.id = h.user_id
h.`status` = 1
and (h.title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or u.nickname like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
ORDER BY h.create_time DESC, h.time_start, h.time_end

select h.id, h.cover, h.title, h.content, h.people_number, h.reward, h.time_start, h.time_end, h.user_id, h.create_time, h.update_time, u.avatar, u.nickname from (SELECT id, user_id, cover, title, content, people_number, reward, time_start, time_end, create_time, update_time From a_help WHERE `status` = 1 AND id = #{helpId}) h LEFT JOIN u_user u ON h.user_id = u.id
SELECT id, cover as img, title FROM a_help WHERE `status` = 1 AND id < #{helpId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, cover as img, title FROM a_help WHERE `status` = 1 AND id > #{helpId} ORDER BY id LIMIT 1
SELECT id FROM a_help WHERE status != 5 AND sysdate() >= time_start;
